Let's dance! Point your finger in the air like you're pointing at an airplane. Now, point it down at the ground like you're pointing at a bug. Point up. Point down. Point up. Point down. Up, down. Up, down. Up down, up down, up down, up, down. Stop! Now, let's try another move. Roll your hands like
the wheels on the bus. Roll. Roll. Roll. Roll. Roll, roll. Roll, roll. Roll, roll, roll, roll,
roll, roll, roll, roll. Stop! Now, point your thumbs behind you like you're saying move on back. Point back. Point back. Point back. Point back. Point back, point back,
point back, point back. Back, back, back, back,
back, back, back, back. Stop! Now, let's put them
all together and dance! Point your finger. Wheels on the bus. Move on back. Point. Wheels. Move on back. Move on back. Point. Wheels. Move on back. Move on back. Dance!
